extends GenericWindow

      • checkForSelection

        private void checkForSelection(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer,
                     org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game)
        Monitors the mouse position and state

        This causes options to be highlighted etc. when hovered over.

        Also handles item selection (through clicking)

        Parameters:
        gameContainer - the game container holding this state
        game - the game running this state
